wp:comment.wp:comment_content:
"Since when does a homosexual get labeled a homosexual just by looking at them?"
I must assume that you don't know many gay people. Or that, if you do, you haven't been around when they are yelled at. I am not a homosexual but I have had many people label me as one just by looking at me.
Don't make the mistake of thinking that I am comparing blacks to gays. I am comparing the close-minded ignorance of certain ranks of our society in various points thoughout our history.
